pr_title: Add Analytics event for failing Sanity Check

timeline.message:
NF: Extract sanityCheckError

To be used in a later commit

timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.message:
DEV: Visual Feedback when dev analytics enabled

I spent a bit of time figuring out:
* Whether the button did anything
* Why analytics weren't being sent

This will stop future me from making the same mistakes

timeline.message:
Add Sanity Check Failed Analytic Event

This should theoretically be 0, but it's useful to track regressions
